description: This project supports the office of the UN Resident Coordinator and UNCT efforts to strengthen coordination and coherence of partners’ response to AHI in Egypt focused on national priorities and national planning processes

subproject.corporate outcome: Increased capacity of relevant government bodies and national capacities for  disaster management, risk reduction and mine action through common analysis, dialogue and coordinated activities among government, relevant civil society actors and other partners (i.e. UN, other international organisations, bilateral partners). And regional skills and capacities for conflcit prevention and peacebuilding negotiations strengthened.
subproject.description:
-AI Coordination Mechanism Established
-Information sharing mechanism of all AI activities in Egypt established
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Strengthening Capacity for AHI
